text:
Of course, I'd be happy to help you summarize the text! Here's a summary of the conversation between Person 1 (P1) and Person 2 (P2):
P1: Can you help me find my passport? I think I lost it in a department store.
P2: I'm afraid not, we haven't found any passports here. Have you checked with the shoe department?
P1: Yes, I used my passport there to pay for some shoes with traveler's cheques.
P2: I'll call the shoe department to see if they've found it. Sorry, but it hasn't turned up there either.
P1: What should I do now?
P2: You can fill out a lost property report and I'll keep an eye out for it. It's best to contact your embassy too, so they can issue you a new passport if it doesn't turn up.
P1: Oh no, I seem to be losing things every time I travel!
In this conversation, P1 is trying to locate their lost passport after using it to pay for shoes in a department store. P2 is helpful and informative, providing support and suggestions for how to proceed.</s
